name: Shoving Sweep
summary: You swing your weapon at your foe, rebuffing them back.
description:
You swing your weapon at your foe, rebuffing them back. You attempt to Shove the triggering creature, ignoring the requirement that you have a hand free. The creature continues its movement after the Shove.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
trigger: A creature within your reach leaves a square during a move action it's using.
